div.h3: Union Gap School District , 5 days ago
div.p: Our fantastic team distributed 4770 meals today! Afterward Dominos celebrated our food service staff by feeding them! Big thank you to Dominos. We enjoyed being together but were careful to social distance. We will see everyone next Tuesday from 10:30 - 12:30 for our next meal service. view image

div.h3: Union Gap School District , 6 days ago
div.p:
Families – learning must continue! Teachers are preparing printed materials for your students to complete during the school closure with no internet or device at home. They will contact you directly where materials can be picked up this week. They are also preparing online materials to complete for those with internet access and devices at home.
Families must communicate with teachers. Please respond to messages, calls, etc., as teachers are required to make student contact each week in the mode of communication that you requested during conferences.
Doing nothing is not an option as materials will be assessed by teachers throughout the closure as required by the State of Washington. Grades of pass (student attempted the work) and no credit (student did not attempt the work) will be given for grades K-8. For Washington State History and Algebra (middle school) A-B-Pass-No Credit will be given because they are required for high school.
You should receive instructional materials in print or electronically this week. Check ClassDojo classroom pages for specific instructions. We will be working towards having all grade level weekly schedules on our district website soon so you can get requirements for each grade for every week of closure through June 19th in one easy to find location. Please contact teachers directly with any questions about your student’s school work.

div.h3: Union Gap School District , 6 days ago
div.p: Bulk meal delivery for the next 5 school days is tomorrow in front of the school from 10:30 am - 12:30 pm.

div.h3: Union Gap School District , 8 days ago
div.p:
We miss our students so much that we had to make a video!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iZWkFqN0Nbw

div.h3: Union Gap School District , 13 days ago
div.p: Families - Today, Governor Jay Inslee officially closed all schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. As a district, we are committed to doing whatever we can to be a resource to our community, families, staff and most importantly our students. In the days ahead we will receive more guidance from the state, adapt our plans and communicate with you about the remainder of the school year. Thank you for your patience and grace.
